content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM not only relentlessly pursues the best solutions for our customers – we passionately act for good. Our employees are empowered to lead socially responsible education, environmental and community initiatives for the good of the world and everyone in it. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a company, we give back to the communities where we live and work and share our time, talent and knowledge to make a difference.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM’s education programs and partnerships\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" work to improve the knowledge of students across the world by using our expertise in technology. Our seamless and borderless approach has made positive changes in the IT sector.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":219089,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/67022664-0a77-41f2-b600-ba43c5a24cc9/UA.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/67022664-0a77-41f2-b600-ba43c5a24cc9/UA.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"UA.png\",\"name\":\"UA.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"67022664-0a77-41f2-b600-ba43c5a24cc9\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":592,\"height\":322},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The total number of children attending each eKids wave is about 500, and the number of volunteer-trainers is more than 120 every year.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":255401,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/90542c6d-d2e6-427c-8a12-b967f8bccd15/6.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/90542c6d-d2e6-427c-8a12-b967f8bccd15/6.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"6.png\",\"name\":\"6.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"90542c6d-d2e6-427c-8a12-b967f8bccd15\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":599,\"height\":339},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every year more than 60 EPAMers visit schools with lectures about the IT world.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":214307,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/92db275e-1ec2-412b-91f0-80656add13da/7.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/92db275e-1ec2-412b-91f0-80656add13da/7.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"7.png\",\"name\":\"7.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"92db275e-1ec2-412b-91f0-80656add13da\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":600,\"height\":338},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every year more than 9000 kids visit EPAM station in KidsWill city of professions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":287341,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/599e84d3-9ac1-4b9f-9efd-a9c874a0da6f/8.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/599e84d3-9ac1-4b9f-9efd-a9c874a0da6f/8.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"8.png\",\"name\":\"8.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"599e84d3-9ac1-4b9f-9efd-a9c874a0da6f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":600,\"height\":338},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All our programs for juniors are free and include a job interview as a final stage of the program, in order to join the company’s projects in the internal pre-production laboratory. 97% of graduates get offers to obtain junior positions at EPAM.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The education program is conducted in cooperation with the largest universities and technical faculties of Ukraine. Currently, more than 20 universities in Kyiv, Kharkiv, Lviv, Dnipro, and Vinnytsia are involved in the program.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Social innovation\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" has no boundaries. We strive to ensure that our activities have a positive impact on society.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":231306,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eb34d1c1-a64f-4788-9aca-e4f2538df9cf/9.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eb34d1c1-a64f-4788-9aca-e4f2538df9cf/9.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"9.png\",\"name\":\"9.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"eb34d1c1-a64f-4788-9aca-e4f2538df9cf\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":600,\"height\":338},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":205001,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/28e2e445-b70c-417c-a49c-5bc700703d9f/10.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/28e2e445-b70c-417c-a49c-5bc700703d9f/10.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"10.png\",\"name\":\"10.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"28e2e445-b70c-417c-a49c-5bc700703d9f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":600,\"height\":338},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM UA also actively supports schools and universities with charity IT equipment and furniture.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Everyone and every company need to take care of the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"environment \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"and recognize their role in the larger ecosystem. EPAM strives to execute more advanced ecological management on a global scale.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":249250,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a584cc61-d2e2-4f0c-b42a-b1dd28183d84/12.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a584cc61-d2e2-4f0c-b42a-b1dd28183d84/12.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"12.png\",\"name\":\"12.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a584cc61-d2e2-4f0c-b42a-b1dd28183d84\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":600,\"height\":338},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To be aware of all EPAM CSR news use \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"#EPAMCSR\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" on Facebook.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":366050,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/117a98d6-acb5-400a-a722-81935240e630/13.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/117a98d6-acb5-400a-a722-81935240e630/13.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"13.png\",\"name\":\"13.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"117a98d6-acb5-400a-a722-81935240e630\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":600,\"height\":338},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
